text: Muhaajiriin kee Ansaarak lakal yeemeneeh guuroh Madiinâ fanah gexeeh Yallih gital siinî luk yinggicillee mari, toysa too mari sin loowot yaniih isin litoonum loonuuh siinil tanim keenil tan, Ramad-le marak gariiy garul keenik xayuk Raaqa nagrâ caddol Yallih kitaabal (kay Madqaa kee kay sharqil), diggah Yalli ummaanim yaaxigi kinni
